history.proof: intros. apply (expf_L1_eq m x y z t); auto. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros m x y z i m1 y0 m2 t Hinv Hexp Hexd Hexpf1 Hexpf2 Hexpf3 Hexpf4.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let m2 := L m one x y in let t := Iter (cF m2) i z in inv_hmap m2 -> exd m z -> expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0 => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
expf_not_orbit_x_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_impl_expf_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 t -> expf m z t -> expf m1 z t
expf_L1_I_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in ~ expf m x y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0
expf_L1_I_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m z t \/ expf m z x /\ expf m t y0 \/ expf m t x /\ expf m z y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_not_orbit_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
Iter_cF_L1_i : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> Iter (cF m1) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
expf_L1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> expf m1 z t < -> expf m z t
expf_L0_CN_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
expf_L1_II_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> betweenf m x z y0 /\ betweenf m x t y0 \/ betweenf m y_1 z x10 /\ betweenf m y_1 t x10 \/ ~ expf m x z /\ expf m z t -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_L0_CN_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t
expf_L0_6 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y t -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
cF_L1_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x = Iter (cF m) i x
not_expf_L1_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> ~ expf m1 x z
expf_expf_L0_2_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
not_expf_L1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> ~ expf m1 y0 z
degree_L1_merge_x_others : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> MF.degree m1 z = MF.degree m z
expf_L1_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let y0 := cA m zero y in let m1 := L m one x y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m x z -> expf m1 x z
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
diff_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> 0 < i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x <> x
orb_L1_eqs : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> eqs (MF.Iter_orb m1 z) (MF.Iter_orb m z)
degree_L1_merge_x_others_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (n : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dz := MF.degree m z in inv_hmap m1 -> exd m z -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> n < dz -> MF.degree_aux m1 z (dz - n) = MF.degree_aux m z (dz - n)
expf_L0_5bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m x_1 t \/ expf m y z /\ expf m y t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_5 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let y0 := cA m zero y in let m1 := L m one x y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m y0 z -> expf m1 y0 z
cF_L1_x_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> i <= j < dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x = Iter (cF m) i x
between_expf_L0_4_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m y_0_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
diff_cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> j + 1 + i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 <> x
diff_cF_L1_x_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> 0 < i <= j /\ j < dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x <> x
diff_cF_L1_y_1_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> j + 1 + i <= dx - 1 -> 0 < i -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 <> y_1
between_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in betweenf m x_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
diff_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x <> x
between_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_L0_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in (if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z \/ expf m z t) -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
cF_L1_y0_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in j < dx - 1 -> y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) (j + 1) x = x
between_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> j < dx - 1 -> j + 1 + i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 = Iter (cF m) (j + 1 + i) x
diff_y_1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy0 := MF.degree m y0 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy0 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x <> x

``` 
intros m x y z i m1 y0 m2 t Hinv Hexp Hexd Hexpf1 Hexpf2 Hexpf3 Hexpf4.
unfold m1, m2, y0, t. intros. 
apply (expf_L1_eq m x y z t); auto.
```

original: intros m x y z i m1 y0 m2 t Hinv Hexp Hexd Hexpf1 Hexpf2 Hexpf3 Hexpf4. unfold m1, m2, y0, t. intros. apply (expf_L1_eq m x y z t); auto.
